# delegate

**Instance Property**

The delegate of the sheet presentation controller.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any UISheetPresentationControllerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Managing the delegate

- **UISheetPresentationControllerDelegate**: The interface that an object implements to respond to size changes in a sheet presentation controller.
